sentences.sContent: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.sCn: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.sContent: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.sCn: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.sContent: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.sCn: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.sContent: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.sCn: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.sContent: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.sCn: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.sContent: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.sCn: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.sContent: a decision that changed the course of history
History shows that the usual response to violent protest is repression.
sentences.sCn: 历史表明，一般对待暴力抗议的回应就是镇压。

名垂史册；影响历史进程的大事

有历史意义的；历史上著名的

trans.tranCn: 历史，历史学；历史记录；来历
trans.tranOther: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation
